title: Patient Care Practical Competency Enhancement: Experience-Based Microlearning for Engineering Education and Personal Growth

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of engineering fundamentals and professional workplace experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can present solutions to everyday workplace problems using engineering design tools.
Learners can describe three or more connections between engineering theories and practical experiences through reflective journaling.
Learners can develop project plans applying a systems thinking approach through case-based learning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
